title: Work Experience
body: I am a 15 year old boy looking for a work experience opportunity at riot games OCE. I love league of legends and would like to get a chance to work with riot for a week. Can I get work exeperience at the Riot Games Office in Sydney?

replies.body:
Work exprience...

Kiddo. Atleast pick a position. You expect riot to accept an aplicant that cant even differentiate between a company and the occupations?
Don't think this is the place to ask
